name: War In Arms
description:
War In Arms is a fast paced first person shooter that creates a new experience for mobile & PC games. Set in the modern era it brings a new wave of weapons never seen before and innovation to the mobile market with impressive graphics/mechanics.

Features:

  • Earn skins!
  • Earn Weapons! 
  • Complete Challenges and contracts!

RESOURCES AND MEDIA
